<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

A map view.

## Properties

### `options`
Configures the look and feel of the map.

* `provider`: Map provider and style to use.
* `zoom`: Zoom level for the map. The default is 16.
